explanation: [0-0] The picture shows a dark purple curtain with light purple patterns on it. There is a bright purple seam on the upper left side of the curtain.

[0-8] Then the curtain opens, and in a dimly lit room, a spotlight illuminates an ornate purple throne. On the throne sits a chubby pink piglet wearing devil horn ornaments and a purple waistband. The piglet is holding a sparkling magic wand. A little girl in a blue dress and gray hat is standing in front of the throne. The piglet waves its wand, and the little girl instantly jumps next to a bucket with a broom beside it. The little girl picks up the broom and starts sweeping the area in front of the throne. The spotlight follows the little girl's movements.
